headline: How Executive Changes and Earnings Miss at Everest Group (EG) Have Changed Its Investment Story
summary: Everest Group, Ltd. recently announced major executive changes, appointing Elias Habayeb as its future Chief Financial Officer effective May 2026 and Gary Haase as Executive Vice President and CEO of Legacy Operations, following the departure and retirement of key leaders. These significant leadership moves follow Everest’s sale of its US$2 billion commercial retail insurance business and come after a quarter with revenue and net income results missing analyst expectations. We’ll examine how...
